body: //div[contains(concat(' ',normalize-space(@class),' '),' blogpage ')]
date: //time[@itemprop="datepublished"]/@datetime

strip_id_or_class: c-blog-header
strip_id_or_class: c-blog-footer
strip_id_or_class: c-blog-authors
strip_id_or_class: c-blog-comments
strip_id_or_class: c-blog-commentform
strip: //form

prune: no

test_url: https://typo3.com/blog/interview-our-new-project-manager-markus-kamp
